name: Kill the Shredder
description:
YOU NEED TO PLAY IN FULLSCREEN TO SEE YOUR HEALTH, WEAPON ETC.

W A S D - >MOVE
LEFT SHIFT -> RUN
LEFT CLICK -> SHOOT
RIGHT CLICK -> CHANGE WEAPON

RED PICK -> HEALTH BONUS
BLUE PICK -> SPEED BONUS
WHITE PICK -> REFRESH AMMO + 1 DECELERATOR

This was my first jam, and also my first game. So I tried to choose a style which is easy to draw and find tutorials about :)

Kill the shredder is a game where you kill, as a guitar teacher, shredder students who come to your class to learn soulful jazz soloing techniques. Even though you tried to teach them interesting scales and rhythms, they insist on playing fast notes on A minor pentatonic scale. After a point you couldn't take it anymore and went into a coma :(

In this game you are dreaming about your shredder students.You are trying to kill the different types of shredders, collect different types of picks, and get the high score.

Note: Once you start to dream, you will never wake up.

Shredding: Playing "A lot of" notes.
